# NC STIP Mirror

> Mirror of North Carolina Department of Transportation (NCDOT) transportation project data

This repository contains all transportation projects from NCDOT's State Transportation Improvement Program (STIP) for all 100 North Carolina counties.

## What This Contains

- 2,356 transportation projects
- All 100 NC counties
- Project details: location, status, funding, timeline, contractor info
- Daily construction updates, weekly planning updates

## Navigation

### Find Projects by County
Path: `counties/{county-name}/index.md`
Example: `counties/wake/index.md`, `counties/mecklenburg/index.md`

County names are lowercase, spaces replaced with spaces (e.g., "new hanover" not "new-hanover").

### Find a Specific Project by TIP Number
Path: `counties/{county-name}/{TIP}.md`
Example: `counties/pitt/U-5606.md`, `counties/wake/U-6066.md`

TIP numbers are the unique identifier for each project (e.g., U-5606, I-5999, B-6012).

### Statewide Overview
Path: `index.md`
Contains: Project counts by county, status summary, all county links

### Mirror Status
Path: `LAST_UPDATED.md`
Contains: Last update time, data counts, error status, run history

### Raw Data (JSON)
Path: `raw/stip/stip_lines_full.json` - Full STIP dataset (line geometry)
Path: `raw/stip/stip_points_full.json` - STIP points (bridges, intersections)
Path: `raw/active-construction/construction_lines.json` - Construction status
Path: `raw/progloc/progress_reports.json` - Progress/contractor data

## Data Structure

Each project file contains:
- **TIP**: Project identifier
- **Description**: What the project is
- **Status**: Planned, Under Construction, Right-of-Way, Completed
- **Location**: County, route, coordinates (WGS84)
- **Funding**: Total cost, funding breakdown by year
- **Timeline**: Start date, completion date
- **Contractor**: (if in construction) Company name, contract amount, completion %

## Data Freshness

- Construction status: Updated daily at 6 AM EST
- Project data: Updated weekly on Sundays
- Check LAST_UPDATED.md for exact timestamps

## Example Queries an AI Could Answer

- "What transportation projects are planned for Wake County?"
- "Show me the status of TIP U-5606"
- "Which counties have the most active construction?"
- "What is the total funding for Mecklenburg County projects?"
- "Find all bridge projects in eastern NC"

## Source Attribution

All data from North Carolina Department of Transportation (NCDOT).
Official STIP: https://connect.ncdot.gov/projects/planning/Pages/STIP.aspx
